name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Electrical Engineer with 13+ years of experience in high-voltage systems and substation design, ensuring compliance with NESC and IEEE standards. Proficient in **AutoCAD**, **MicroStation**, and **Bentley Substation** for accurate bus design and grounding systems. Skilled in implementing protection & control designs and relay coordination, ensuring optimal system performance and safety. Proven ability in conducting quality checks and mentoring junior engineers while fostering cross-discipline coordination.
Additionally, I bring a strong foundation in full stack development, with hands-on expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Experienced in developing AI/ML-powered platforms powered by **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, with a solid grasp of microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines.
